Class IssuingCardPinService

    Methods for retrieval / update of a Stripe Issuing card

    • Method Detail

      • retrievePin

        public void retrievePin(java.lang.String cardId,
                        java.lang.String verificationId,
                        java.lang.String userOneTimeCode,
                        IssuingCardPinService.IssuingCardPinRetrievalListener listener)

        Retrieves a PIN for a given card

        Parameters:
        cardId - the ID of the card (looks like ic_abcdef1234)
        verificationId - the ID of the verification that was sent to the cardholder (typically server-side, through /v1/issuing/verifications)
        userOneTimeCode - the one-time code that was sent to the cardholder through sms or email
        listener - a listener for either the PIN, or any error that can occur

      • updatePin

        public void updatePin(java.lang.String cardId,
                      java.lang.String newPin,
                      java.lang.String verificationId,
                      java.lang.String userOneTimeCode,
                      IssuingCardPinService.IssuingCardPinUpdateListener listener)

        Retrieves a PIN for a given card

        Parameters:
        cardId - the ID of the card (looks like ic_abcdef1234)
        newPin - the new desired PIN
        verificationId - the ID of the verification that was sent to the cardholder (typically server-side, through /v1/issuing/verifications)
        userOneTimeCode - the one-time code that was sent to the cardholder through sms or email
        listener - a listener for either the PIN, or any error that can occur

      • create

        public static IssuingCardPinService create(android.content.Context context,
                                           EphemeralKeyProvider keyProvider)

        Create a IssuingCardPinService with the provided interface EphemeralKeyProvider.

        Parameters:
        keyProvider - an interface EphemeralKeyProvider used to obtain an class EphemeralKey
        See Also:
        interface EphemeralKeyProvider
